pageContent.descriptionText: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">I’ve wanted to start a treatment for patients who haven’t responded to traditional methods. However, with insurance and Medicare and Medicaid, and all the hoops and roadblocks put in the way, I’ve had to keep patients on less-efficacious treatments. Regulations and reform have their place, but I also feel they can negatively impact my effectiveness as a doctor.</welcomeText>
